response.answer_text: Of course, there are literally thousands of books that deal with the horror genre. I myself have written two books and I’m on my third book. Classics include Mary Shelley’s Frankenstein, Bram Stoker’s Dracula, literally dozens by Stephen King, Dean Koontz, Ann Rice, and countless others. Go to any bookseller website and you will find many, many books. Click If You Dare: 100 Favorite Horror Stories

Yes, they do. One famous example is It, written by Stephen King, and lots of other books by him. Another popular example is Lovecraftian horror, which even generated (or popularized) a new genre. A surprisingly large amount of horror movies are based on books or mythology.
